titleNullable: The Complete Pokemon Images Data Set
subtitleNullable: A collection of 898 images of all the Pokemons taken from the Pokedex database.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

As necessity is the mother of all invention, this data set was a necessity for a personal project on matching Pokemon images. No other data set had been recently updated and hence this data set was born.

### Content

There are around 898 "name.png" files present in this folder. The file name holds the name of the pokemon in the picture.

### Acknowledgements

I solely thank Sanjai Kumaran, for getting me involved with the pokemon matching project in the first place, which down the timeline brings you this dataset.

### Inspiration

Given some statistics and features of an unknown pokemon, predicting how that pokemon would look like would be a challenging task, once the next versions of this dataset is released.

### Future Work
Would add a way to easily scrape stats and details about the pokemons. Transforming these features to pokemons would be an interesting problem to explore.
title: The Complete Pokemon Images Data Set

description:
### Context

As necessity is the mother of all invention, this data set was a necessity for a personal project on matching Pokemon images. No other data set had been recently updated and hence this data set was born.

### Content

There are around 898 "name.png" files present in this folder. The file name holds the name of the pokemon in the picture.

### Acknowledgements

I solely thank Sanjai Kumaran, for getting me involved with the pokemon matching project in the first place, which down the timeline brings you this dataset.

### Inspiration

Given some statistics and features of an unknown pokemon, predicting how that pokemon would look like would be a challenging task, once the next versions of this dataset is released.

### Future Work
Would add a way to easily scrape stats and details about the pokemons. Transforming these features to pokemons would be an interesting problem to explore.
